name: Gladiator Escape Free
description:
Gladiator has escaped from the Jail of Coliseum to find his beloved wife. The security is deadly tight. If you fall, you die. Help gladiator to escape and avoid the deadly traps lying on his way. You have to be very careful while selecting the puzzling paths. You will encounter scouts which are set to capture and kill the Gladiator. Be equipped to fight and defeat them hardly.

Get ready for an amazing escape experience with Gladiator!

Download and Escape Now!

FEATURES:
• Interactive Tutorial
• 30 Easy Escape Levels
• 20 Hard Escape Levels
• 3 different worlds
• Quick Play mode
